channel.title: Client Card on DaisBase
channel.description: Recent content in Client Card on DaisBase

item.title: Adding a New Client Card
item.description: Adding a new Client Card displays the Summary Client Card Screen. This screen enables you to enter a minimum of information to establish a new card whilst at the same time providing enough information to make the card relevant when saved. This gives you the flexibility to quickly add a card ‘on the fly’ and complete the less critical information later (if you want to). To an experienced user most fields on this screen are self-explanatory however Dealerlogic has an intuitive way of interpreting addresses that you may wish to experiment with.
